skilllist.skilldesc:
Kupa recovers 10% Max HP per second after not taking damage for 5s. When Kupa is killed, Popol can <font color="a6aafb">Pray</font> for 3s to bring Kupa back to the battlefield. Cooldown: 30s.
Every 3 consecutive attacks from Kupa will enhance Popol's next Basic Attack to deal <font color="fba51f"> (+220% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. Kupa has 2500<font color="fba51f"> (+1200% Total Physical Attack)</font> Max HP and inherits 100% of Popol's other attributes and passive equipment effects (excluding Jungling and Roaming equipment effects).
Kupa deals an additional 120% damage against Creeps.

Popol throws a spear at the target enemy, dealing 80<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> while simultaneously commanding Kupa to lunge at the target, dealing an additional 70<font color="fba51f"> (+75% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. Kupa will continue to attack the target for 3s.
<font color="a6aafb">Alpha Wolf Form</font>: Kupa stuns the enemy for 1s and bites them 3 times in quick succession.

Popol summons Kupa back to his side, gaining a 240<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> shield while dealing 240<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 35% for 0.5s. Kupa will then assist Popol to attack nearby enemies for 3s.
<font color="a6aafb">Alpha Wolf Form</font>: Kupa darts back to Popol, knocking nearby enemies airborne for 0.2s. The shield and damage are increased to 125%.

Popol sets a trap at the target location that will detonate after a short delay once triggered, dealing 70<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the enemy that steps on it, immobilizing them for 1s, and creating a frost zone for 4s. Enemies in the frost zone will have their Movement Speed reduced by 20%.
Popol gains a trap charge every 22s (up to 3). Up to 3 traps can exist at the same time on the battlefield, each lasting up to 60s.

Popol and Kupa enter the Enraged state for 12s, gaining 15% extra Movement Speed and increasing their Attack Speed to 1.3 times.
Kupa turns into <font color="a6aafb">Alpha Wolf Form</font>, gaining 1500 extra Max HP, fully restoring its HP, while <font color="a6aafb">enhancing</font> its other skills.

Kupa recovers 10% Max HP per second after not taking damage for 5s. When Kupa is killed, Popol can <font color="a6aafb">Pray</font> for 3s to bring Kupa back to the battlefield. Cooldown: 30s.
Every 3 consecutive attacks from Kupa will enhance Popol's next Basic Attack to deal <font color="fba51f"> (+220% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. Kupa has 2500<font color="fba51f"> (+1200% Total Physical Attack)</font> Max HP and inherits 100% of Popol's other attributes and passive equipment effects (excluding Jungling and Roaming equipment effects).
Kupa deals an additional 120% damage against Creeps.

Popol throws a spear at the target enemy, dealing 80<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> while simultaneously commanding Kupa to lunge at the target, dealing an additional 70<font color="fba51f"> (+75% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. Kupa will continue to attack the target for 3s.
<font color="a6aafb">Alpha Wolf Form</font>: Kupa stuns the enemy for 1s and bites them 3 times in quick succession.

Popol summons Kupa back to his side, gaining a 240<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> shield while dealing 240<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 35% for 0.5s. Kupa will then assist Popol to attack nearby enemies for 3s.
<font color="a6aafb">Alpha Wolf Form</font>: Kupa darts back to Popol, knocking nearby enemies airborne for 0.2s. The shield and damage are increased to 125%.

Popol sets a trap at the target location that will detonate after a short delay once triggered, dealing 70<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the enemy that steps on it, immobilizing them for 1s, and creating a frost zone for 4s. Enemies in the frost zone will have their Movement Speed reduced by 20%.
Popol gains a trap charge every 22s (up to 3). Up to 3 traps can exist at the same time on the battlefield, each lasting up to 60s.

Popol and Kupa enter the Enraged state for 12s, gaining 15% extra Movement Speed and increasing their Attack Speed to 1.3 times.
Kupa turns into <font color="a6aafb">Alpha Wolf Form</font>, gaining 1500 extra Max HP, fully restoring its HP, while <font color="a6aafb">enhancing</font> its other skills.

data.name: Popol and Kupa

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: High Attack makes wolf more tanky.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+16 Adaptive Attack
+5% Lifesteal

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by <%Num2> for <Num1>s and restores <Num3> HP (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equiplist.equipskill1: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equiptips:
+35% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance
+20 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
equiplist.equipskill2: Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+8% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40% Crit Damage
+65 Extra Physical Attack
+25% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

recommendmasterplan.name: nanayenaung81
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: Boy and an Icefield Wolf, partners who understand each other well.

assist.desc: Popol and Kupa are best with Fighters that can charge into enemies' midst and ensure the survival of Popol and Kupa after controlling and killing enemies. For example, Alpha and Khaleed.

strong.desc: Kupa is powerful in combat, especially against Marksmen with lower sustainability such as Lesley and Brody.

weak.desc:
But since Popol and Kupa don't have any Blink skills
and Popol is quite squishy, they are at the mercy of more agile Assassins like Gusion and Karina.
